document_data.name: The Queen's Gambit
document_data.mainbody: The '''Queen's Gambit''' was a religious festival observed by followers of the [[Red Knight]].
document_data.Description: The Queen's Gambit occurred on the first day of [[Tarsakh]]. The Red Knight's clergy celebrated with a tournament of [[Chess (game)|chess]]. Prizes included titles, promotions, and occasionally a gift from the temple armory.
